## LinearCardContainer.getCard() method

Gets a card by index.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCard(index: number): TCard;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number | Index of the card to get, starting at 0 and strictly less than <code>count</code>. |

**Returns:**

TCard

Retrieved card.
